items.summary: Remove backend authorization/auth checks that block core actions: creating products and sending purchase requests. Specifically, update the Motoko canister so that `addProduct(...)` and `buyProduct(productName)` no longer require admin/user permissions and do not trap due to missing roles/sessions; these calls must succeed for any caller as long as the product exists and is not sold out.

Update the frontend to handle the new backend behavior for product creation and purchasing: ensure UI does not depend on admin/user authorization to perform `Create Product` and `Send Purchase Request`, and that any error messages shown to the user are in English and reflect the actual backend error message.

Replace transparent UI backgrounds with solid, non-transparent backgrounds across the app. Audit all dialogs/menus/overlays used in the Shop and Admin flows (including the product creation dialog and the product view/purchase dialog) and ensure their content surfaces render with an opaque background color so underlying UI does not bleed through.
